name: Cheating Simulator: Unstable Relationships
description:
**In-game tutorial not working for browser, read below** Run around and date as many people as you can!

Use WASD/Arrow Keys to move around.

Approach a person and press SPACE to date.

Don't get caught cheating!

Try to avoid being seen dating someone else by anyone you've dated before.

Love doesn't last long

Your relationship with your lovers degrades over time. Date them again to rescue your relationship.

I will look for you, I will find you and I will DATE you

If you let the relationship degrades, it will become unstable.  They'll try to find you aggressively and force you to date them.
